fields.name: ***Intercept Shoplifter***:
fields.value: Choose several players based on your score (0-50% = 1, 51-100% = 2). Your targets gain immunity to any score deductions less than or equal to 12 percentage points by non-Town members. No visit is triggered if your target does not suffer a score deduction.

fields.name: ***CCTV** (2x, Locked)*:
fields.value: Unlocked if you score in the top 3. Learn one random visit (visitor and target) tonight.
